text: It dries quickly, so it's fine.

Oh, you're not worried about it being damp?
I'll help you dry it, come here.

But it's nice, Asahi-chan, Seems like you don't have
to do anything when you wake up in the morning.
That's right, I don't do anything.

Mei-chan, what about cutting your hair short?
Like mine.
Huh? Do you think it would suit me?

......Oh, but I like Mei-chan's hair color,
So, it's better to leave it as it is!
